document.heading: Fiscal Year 2004 Budget Support Act of 2003

history.narrative: Law 15-39, the “Fiscal Year 2004 Budget Support Act of 2003”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-218, which was referred to Committee on Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 6, 2003, and June 3, 2003, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 20, 2003, it was assigned Act No. 15-106 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-39 became effective on November 13, 2003.
